revised_title: A New Hamiltonian Theory of Electrons
tldr: The author proposes a new classical theory of electrons based on continuous electric streams moving in accordance with the equations of Maxwell and Lorentz. The theory is expanded to include several interpenetrating electric streams and is put into Hamiltonian form to potentially aid in the development of a new quantum theory of electrons. The main focus is on finding the equations that describe continuous electric streams, which may provide a more reliable foundation for electrodynamic theory and help solve problems in atomic physics.
